sentences.sContent: Obviously, given that impossibility, we have to do the next best thing.
sentences.sContent_eng: Obviously, given that impossibility, we have to do the next best thing.
sentences.sCn: 明显地，考虑到那是不可能的，我们必须做好下一个事情。

sentences.sContent: After all, there does not seem to be any inherent impossibility in the combination.
sentences.sContent_eng: After all, there does not seem to be any inherent impossibility in the combination.
sentences.sCn: 毕竟，在这种组合中似乎没有任何固有的不可能性。

sentences.sContent: I, frankly, find this concept a near impossibility for the company to accomplish at present.
sentences.sContent_eng: I, frankly, find this concept a near impossibility for the company to accomplish at present.
sentences.sCn: 说实话，我觉得这个理念是现在微软几乎不可能实现的了的。

words.tran: 不可能的；不可能存在的；难以忍受的；不真实的
不可能地；难以置信地；无法可想地
